(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB finally))
    (VP (VBN plucked)
      (PRT (RP up))
      (NP (DT the) (NN courage)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB visit)
              (NP (NNP Sin) (NNP Huat) (NNP Seafood) (NNP Restaurant)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(plucked-3, I-1)
advmod(plucked-3, finally-2)
root(ROOT-0, plucked-3)
prt(plucked-3, up-4)
det(courage-6, the-5)
dobj(plucked-3, courage-6)
aux(visit-8, to-7)
infmod(courage-6, visit-8)
nn(Restaurant-12, Sin-9)
nn(Restaurant-12, Huat-10)
nn(Restaurant-12, Seafood-11)
dobj(visit-8, Restaurant-12)

        (NP (DT this) (JJ infamous) (NN restaurant))

          (ADVP
            (ADVP (IN at) (JJS least))
            (RB once))
          (IN in)
          (NP (PRP$ his) (NN lifetime)))))
    (. ?)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBD turned)
      (PRT (RP out))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP$ our) (NNP Food) (NNP Nazi))
          (VP
            (VP (VBD started)
              (NP (NN life))
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ humble) (NN pig) (NN farmer))))
            (CC and)
            (VP (VBD was)
              (VP (VBN forced)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB open)
                      (NP (DT a) (NN restaurant))
                      (SBAR
                        (WHADVP (WRB when))
                        (S
                          (NP (DT the) (NNP Goverment))

                            (PRT (RP down))

                                    (NP (NNP Punggol))))))

                              (NP (DT the) (JJ early) (NNS nineties)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))
